data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3459428,"name":"Owen Flanagan","username":"OwenF","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/o/edb3f5/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-12-14T23:06:55.768Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eMy team just got a new \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003ePDH\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"REV's Power Distribution Hub\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e for the upcoming season. However, its been having issues. It doesn’t spread power out evenly(which I think they are supposed to do) so some of our motors just don’t work if the rest of the bot is running(specifically one swerve module will barely move while the other three work just fine). We know its not a motor issue as the module works completely fine as long as it’s running alone. The \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003ePDH\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"REV's Power Distribution Hub\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e shows a hardware fault as well as flickering a \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eCAN\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Controller Area Network\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e fault(which is exclusive to the \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003ePDH\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"REV's Power Distribution Hub\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e, all of the other devices have fine \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eCAN\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Controller Area Network\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e connections). The \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003ePDH\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"REV's Power Distribution Hub\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e also refuses to accept any updates. When we tried plugging in a different \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003ePDH\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"REV's Power Distribution Hub\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e everything worked fine so its definitely an issue with the \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003ePDH\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"REV's Power Distribution Hub\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eHas anybody had this issue or have suggestions on how to fix it?
